system.description:
Effect: Roll 2d8 and decrease the Stage of the stats in the corresponding table by -2 for 5 Activations.

  1. ATK
  2. DEF
  3. SPATK
  4. SPDEF
  5. SPD
  6. ACC
  7. EVA
  8. User Choice<>
